dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4053 IH: VA Timely Mammogram Results Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Negrete McLeod introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish standards for the provision of mammograms at health care facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the VA Timely Mammogram Results Act of 2013.

subsection.text: Subchapter II of chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following section:

section.header: Standards for providing results of mammograms at Department facilities
section.text: The Secretary shall establish standards with respect to the timeliness of providing to patients the results of mammograms performed at a facility of a Department and reporting such results. In establishing such standards, the Secretary shall take into consideration the best practices of the private sector.

subsection.text: The table of sections at the beginning of such chapter is amended by adding after the item relating to section 1720G the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: 1720H. Standards for providing results of mammograms at Department facilities.
